Main.TextJPN: 「ちょ、ちょっと待ってください南井さんっ！」
Main.TextENG: ``W-wait a second, Minai-san!``

Main.TextJPN: 藤田の再三の制止も聞かず、巴は車を降りるなり事件現場に向かってずんずんと歩いていく。さすがに異常を感じた彼は、せめて事情を聞こうと前に回りこんで立ち塞がった。
Main.TextENG: Tomoe ignored Fujita's repeated attempts to stop her as she climbed out of the car and walked toward the crime scene. Sensing that something was off, he stepped in front of her and turned around, trying to block her advance.

Main.TextJPN: 「いったいどうしたんです、南井さんってば！」
Main.TextENG: ``What the hell are you doing, Minai-san?!``

Main.TextJPN: 「どいて…」
Main.TextENG: ``Get out of my way...``

Main.TextJPN: その、静かだが激しい怒りの一瞥を受けて、思わず藤田は息を飲んだ。
Main.TextENG: Fujita couldn't help but gasp at that quiet, but fiercely wrathful remark.

Main.TextJPN: 一体彼女は、…どうしたというのか。
Main.TextENG: What on earth... happened to her?

Main.TextJPN: …藤田がここまで怒りにみちた巴の表情を見たのは、本当に初めてだった。
Main.TextENG: ...This was truly the first time Fujita had ever seen a look of such rage on Tomoe's face.

Main.TextJPN: 山村課長の命令で南井巴という、同い年ながら自分よりも二つ階級が上の女刑事の部下として働き始めてから、２ヶ月あまり。
Main.TextENG: It had been over two months since Section Chief Yamamura assigned him to work with the female detective named Tomoe Minai. Even though they were the same age, he was working as her subordinate, two ranks below her.

Main.TextJPN: 頭は切れるが、案外子供っぽい面もある彼女は愛嬌もあって、とっつきにくいエリートというよりも、真面目だが気配り上手なクラス委員長のイメージに近い。
Main.TextENG: She was smart, but also had a surprisingly childlike side to her. She was also charming and far more approachable than the usual elite course members, complemented by the serious but attentive look of a class representative.

Main.TextJPN: だから、いつも怒鳴られ暴れられたりしながらも、半分じゃれあいも入って彼が制止する役目を果たして、なんとなくうまくやっていたのだ。
Main.TextENG: So, even though she would frequently shout and violently lash out, he would always step in and stop her halfway. Somehow, that arrangement worked well.

Main.TextJPN: でも、…今はできない。いやそれどころか、近寄ることもできない。
Main.TextENG: But... he couldn't do that now. In fact, he couldn't even get close to her.

Main.TextJPN: これまでの怒りが木刀の連打なら、…今のそれは抜き身の真剣。
Main.TextENG: If her anger before was like taking a blow from a wooden sword... right now, she was wielding a real sword.

Main.TextJPN: これ以上近づくと、本当に殺されそうに思えるほどの凶気がそこにはあった。
Main.TextENG: There was a viciousness there that suggested that he'd be killed if he moved in any closer.

Main.TextJPN: 「み、南井さん…？」
Main.TextENG: ``M-Minai-san...?``

Main.TextJPN: そして巴は、固まる藤田の脇を無言ですり抜ける。
Main.TextENG: Then, Tomoe silently walked by Fujita's side as he stood there petrified.

Main.TextJPN: すると、現場で野次馬の整理をしていた二課の刑事が二人、彼女たちの姿に気付いて駆け寄ってきた。
Main.TextENG: After that, two detectives from the second division who were doing crowd control noticed the two of them and quickly ran to them.

Main.TextJPN: 「な、なんですか南井次長！@k@vS11/00/VT3B_keijiA2026.　ここは捜査二課が担当ですよ？」
Main.TextENG: ``Wh-why are you here, Assistant Director Minai?!@k@vS11/00/VT3B_keijiA2026. This scene is under the Second Investigation Division's control.``

Main.TextJPN: 「今さら来ても、うちが仕切ってるんですからね！@k@vS11/00/VT3B_keijiB2021.　捜査の邪魔をするなら――」
Main.TextENG: ``If you step in now, you'll be compromising our authority!@k@vS11/00/VT3B_keijiB2021. If you get in the way of our investigation...``
``...Out of the way...!!``

Main.TextJPN: そのただならぬ雰囲気に圧倒されて、前に立ち塞がった二課の刑事たちは後ずさって道を空ける。巴はそんな彼らを一顧だにせず、立入禁止のテープを越えていった。
Main.TextENG: The two detectives from the Second Division who attempted to stop her were overwhelmed by her intense aura and ended up backing out of her way.

Main.TextJPN: 「み、南井さんっ…！」
Main.TextENG: ``M-Minai-san...!``

Main.TextJPN: 藤田も戸惑いながら、巴の後に続いて現場へと足を踏み入れた。
Main.TextENG: Still feeling puzzled, Fujita followed behind Tomoe and walked to the crime scene.

Main.TextJPN: …赤い警光灯が周囲を照らして点滅する中、鑑識が証拠写真を取りながら現場一帯の調査を行っている。
Main.TextENG: ...Forensic investigation was being conducted and evidence photos were being taken throughout the site, while red police lights flashed all around them.

Main.TextJPN: そして、彼らが忙しく働く人だかりの奥の地面に、…わずかに膨らんだシート。
Main.TextENG: And, behind the crowd of people tirelessly working... was a slightly bulging sheet laying on the ground.

Main.TextJPN: そこへ向かって歩きかけた巴の腕を、横からつかむ手があった。
Main.TextENG: When Tomoe began walking in that direction, a hand grabbed her from the side.

Main.TextJPN: 「姫さん？@k@vS11/00/VT3B_hayami2002.　どうしたんだ、ここはあんたの担当じゃないだろ？」
Main.TextENG: ``Princess?@k@vS11/00/VT3B_hayami2002. What's going on? You're not supposed to be here.``

Main.TextJPN: 「…すみません、速水さん。@k@vS11/28/420101151.すぐ出て行きますので」
Main.TextENG: ``...Please excuse me, Hayami-san.@k@vS11/28/420101151. I'll be out of here soon.``

Main.TextJPN: 「お、おい…」
そう、馴染みの機動捜査隊の刑事に頭を下げてから、返事を待たずに巴はシートをめくり上げた。
Main.TextENG: With that, Tomoe bowed her head to her acquaintance from the mobile investigation team, and then she lifted up the sheet without waiting for an answer.

Main.TextJPN: これまで、死体には見慣れてきたつもりだった。
Main.TextENG: Until now, she'd thought she was getting used to seeing corpses.

Main.TextJPN: 生前の面影すらない惨い有様を見ても、心を切り替えてやってきた。
Main.TextENG: It takes a change of heart to be able to look on at that miserable state of human life.

Main.TextJPN: でも。
Main.TextENG: But.

Main.TextJPN: でも、今は…っ！！
Main.TextENG: But right now...!!

Main.TextJPN: 「姫さん…？」
Main.TextENG: ``Princess...?``

Main.TextJPN: ぎりぎりっとこぶしを激しく握り締めて、…爪が手のひらに食い込む。
Main.TextENG: She clenched her fists so intensely... that her nails bit into her palms.

Main.TextJPN: かみ締めた奥歯から、鈍い音。
Main.TextENG: A dull sound rang out as she clenched her teeth.

Main.TextJPN: そして、口の中から生温かい鉄錆のような匂いを感じて、巴は口元を拭う。
Main.TextENG: Then, sensing the warm, rusty smell emanating from her mouth, Tomoe wiped at her lip.

Main.TextJPN: ぬるっとした液体。…思わず唇をかみ締めるあまり、肉を食い破って血が噴き出していた。
Main.TextENG: It was a slimy liquid. ...She was biting down on her lip without thinking, and she bit hard enough to cut into the meat and spout blood.

Main.TextJPN: 『…ありがとうございました、南井さん』
Main.TextENG: ``...Thank you so much, Minai-san.``

Main.TextJPN: そういって、にこやかに微笑みながら別れた顔が、…まだ瞼の裏に残っている。
Main.TextENG: She had a bright smile on her face when they parted ways... The image still lingered on the back of her eyelids.

Main.TextJPN: 可愛い子だった。
Main.TextENG: She was such a cute girl.

Main.TextJPN: やっと過去を吹っ切って、前に進む希望を見出しかけた強い少女だった。
Main.TextENG: She was a strong girl, who wanted to put the past to rest and finally move forward.

Main.TextJPN: でも。
Main.TextENG: And yet.

Main.TextJPN: そんな彼女と話をしたり、向き合うことは、この先もう二度と…ない。
Main.TextENG: Never again... would she be able to see her face, to have a conversation together.

Main.TextJPN: 「南井さん、…知り合いなんですか？」
Main.TextENG: ``Minai-san... did you know her?``
``...@k@vS11/28/420101155.I met her just a little while ago... and we talked.@k@vS11/28/420101155_1. She was... such a cute girl...!``

Main.TextJPN: ともすれば弾けそうになる激情を懸命に抑え込みながら、…巴はそう言って、呻く。
Main.TextENG: Trying her hardest to suppress her raging emotions... Tomoe said that, and moaned.

Main.TextJPN: 本当に、…本当に、可愛い！　…将来は絶対、美人って言われるような女の子だったんだ！！
Main.TextENG: Really... really cute! ...She surely would've become a beautiful woman in the future!!

Main.TextJPN: それを伝えられないのが、悲しくて、…悔しいっ…！！
Main.TextENG: She lamented that it wouldn't come to be... And regretted it...!!

Main.TextJPN: 「だったらあまり見ないほうがいいぞ、姫さん。@k@vS11/00/VT3B_hayami2007.…通報から駆けつけた時には、もうこんな状態だった」
Main.TextENG: ``It's best not to look too much, Princess.@k@vS11/00/VT3B_hayami2007. ...I rushed here as soon as I got the report, but it was already like this.``

Main.TextJPN: 機捜の刑事――速水はそう言って、巴の肩に手を置く。吐息をひとつついて頭を冷ましてから、巴はシートを戻すと手を合わせて瞑目した。
Main.TextENG: The mobile investigation team detective, Hayami, put a hand on Tomoe's shoulder as he said that. After taking a deep breath to cool her head, Tomoe folded the sheet down, then held her hands together and closed her eyes.

Main.TextJPN: 「…運転手は？」
Main.TextENG: ``...What about the driver?``

Main.TextJPN: 「現場で呆然となっていたよ。@k@vS11/00/VT3B_hayami2009.業務上過失致死の現行犯でついさっき、県警に連行した。@k@vS11/00/VT3B_hayami2010.取調べは今のところ、交通課ではなく本部捜査一課で行われる予定だ」
Main.TextENG: ``He was found at the site, in utter shock.@k@vS11/00/VT3B_hayami2009. The culprit was taken to the prefectural police department's workplace negligence unit.@k@vS11/00/VT3B_hayami2010. At the moment, the investigation is being handled by the First Investigation Division at HQ, rather than the transportation division.``

Main.TextJPN: 「…捜査一課で？」
Main.TextENG: ``...First Investigation Division?``

Main.TextJPN: 速水は頷く。
Main.TextENG: Hayami nodded.

Main.TextJPN: 話によると、その運転手はトラックを通常速度で走らせていると、ちょうど街灯が途切れてわずかに影になっているところで、地面に横たわっている人影に寸前で気付いたらしい。
Main.TextENG: The truck was allegedly driving at normal speed, but the driver only at the last second noticed the shadow of a person on the ground in a shaded area where the streetlights couldn't reach.

Main.TextJPN: そして慌ててハンドルを切ってブレーキを踏んだが、かわしきれずにそのまま――。
Main.TextENG: Then, the driver quickly turned the wheel and slammed on the brakes, but couldn't get away...

Main.TextJPN: 「証言通り、ブレーキの跡は確かにあった。@k@vS11/00/VT3B_hayami2012.今も現場検証中だが、少なくとも人が地面にいるとわかった上で故意に轢いたとは考えにくい」
Main.TextENG: ``The brake markings corroborate that testimony.@k@vS11/00/VT3B_hayami2012. On-site investigation is still ongoing, but it's hard to believe that someone would notice a person on the ground and deliberately strike them.``

Main.TextJPN: 「しかも、飛び出してきたのならともかく、わざわざ街灯が見えにくい場所を選んで横たわって、…いや、『置かれて』いた」
Main.TextENG: ``Moreover, this location was chosen because it was far from the streetlights and hard to see, whether she deliberately chose to jump into traffic... or was ``set`` down there.``

Main.TextJPN: 「車道に好き好んで寝転がる奴などいないことを考えても、事件性が極めて高いと思われる」
Main.TextENG: ``Considering that nobody would ever want to lay down in the road, that probability seems high.``

Main.TextJPN: 「…それで、一課がわざわざ？」
Main.TextENG: ``...So, is the First Division even going to bother with it?``

Main.TextJPN: 「被害者は女子学生だ、おそらくマスコミが食いつく。@k@vS11/00/VT3B_hayami2016.報道対応のことも考慮して、本部で対応したほうがいいというのが堂島課長の判断だ。@k@vS11/00/VT3B_hayami2017.…この遺体も、すぐに司法解剖に回すことになっている」
Main.TextENG: ``The victim is a schoolgirl, so the media is going to eat it up.@k@vS11/00/VT3B_hayami2016. Considering the potential news coverage, Section Chief Doujima decided it would be best for HQ to handle it.@k@vS11/00/VT3B_hayami2017. ...The body is also supposed to be submitted for autopsy immediately.``

Main.TextJPN: 「そうですか…」
Main.TextENG: ``Is that so...?``

Main.TextJPN: 「それよりも姫さん、ここは早く引き上げたほうがいい。@k@vS11/00/VT3B_hayami2019.今ここには、二課の――」
Main.TextENG: ``More importantly, Princess, you should get out of here right away.@k@vS11/00/VT3B_hayami2019. This area is under the Second Division's authority...``

Main.TextJPN: そう、速水が巴に耳打ちしたところへ、折り悪くやってきたのは二課の岡部課長と児島だった。
Main.TextENG: Unfortunately, as Hayami whispered that to Tomoe, Section Chief Okabe and Kojima from the Second Division had arrived.

Main.TextJPN: 「…なんだね、君たちは」
Main.TextENG: ``...What are you doing here?``

Main.TextJPN: 「ここは捜査二課の担当ですよ、南井次長？」
Main.TextENG: ``You realize that the Second Division is in charge of this location... right, Assistant Director Minai?``

Main.TextJPN: 威圧的な態度の彼らに一応目礼してから、巴はシートを戻して立ち上がる。
Main.TextENG: After a quick glance at the two of them and their magnanimous demeanor, Tomoe turned away from the sheet and rose to her feet.

Main.TextJPN: 岡部は邪魔だ、と言いたげにわざと速水と彼女の間に割り込むと、児島にシートをめくり上げさせた。
Main.TextENG: Okabe stepped between her and Hayami as if to say they were in the way, and made Kojima lift the sheet.

Main.TextJPN: 「…見るに耐えん有様だな。@k@vS11/00/421100025.生前の面影跡形もなし、か」
Main.TextENG: ``...I can hardly bear to look.@k@vS11/00/421100025. There's not even a trace of how she looked when she still lived, huh.``

Main.TextJPN: 「後で写真をお渡しします。そのへんで」
Main.TextENG: ``I'll give you the photos later, so let's leave it at that.``

Main.TextJPN: そう言って、速水は少し強引にシートを戻させる。…彼なりの、巴への気遣いだった。
Main.TextENG: Having said that, Hayami somewhat forcefully began laying the sheet back down. ...He was being considerate of Tomoe.

Main.TextJPN: 「どうだね、事件性は？」
Main.TextENG: ``So, what can you tell us about the incident?``

Main.TextJPN: 「遺体の司法解剖が済んだ後で、正式に報告します。@k@vS11/00/VT3B_hayami2022.鑑識の見解では、被害者は轢死する直前まで生きていたと思われますので、一課主導で事件捜査を行う予定です」
Main.TextENG: ``An official report will be provided after formal autopsy.@k@vS11/00/VT3B_hayami2022. The forensics team believes the victim was alive up until she was struck, and we are planning to conduct this investigation led by the First Division at HQ.``

Main.TextJPN: 「ふん、マスコミが喜んで飛びついてきそうな事件だな。@k@vS11/00/421100028.自殺なら受験勉強の疲れ、失恋からの絶望。殺人なら怨恨、暴行といったところか。@k@vS11/00/421100029.…後始末をするこちらの身にもなってもらいたいものだ」
Main.TextENG: ``Hmph, the media will be happy to jump on an incident like this.@k@vS11/00/421100028. If it's a suicide, they'll say she was overworked studying for exams, or fell to despair from a broken heart. If it's murder, they'll peg it as a grudge or assault.@k@vS11/00/421100029. ...I'd love to be the person who has to clean this up.``

Main.TextJPN: 状況も知らずに言うな、と叫びたい気持ちを、巴は懸命にこらえた。
Main.TextENG: Tomoe did everything to resist the urge to shout at him and tell him to keep his mouth shut if he doesn't know the circumstances.

Main.TextJPN: 「とりあえず、捜査一課が出張ってくるのなら我々の出る幕はないな。@k@vS11/00/421100031.…あとは地域課に任せて、我々は引き上げてもいいかね？」
Main.TextENG: ``Anyway, as long as the First Division takes over, there's no reason for us to take action.@k@vS11/00/421100031. ...After that, we can leave it to the community affairs division and it'll be out of our hands?``

Main.TextJPN: 「どうぞ。お疲れ様です」
Main.TextENG: ``Please do. Thank you for your assistance.``

Main.TextJPN: 「そんなわけだから南井次長、君たちも引き上げたまえ。@k@vS11/00/421100033.…手柄を横取りするつもりだったかもしれんが、当てが外れたな」
Main.TextENG: ``With that in mind, Assistant Director Minai, you all should be on your way.@k@vS11/00/421100033. ...If you came here expecting to steal our thunder, you were mistaken.``

Main.TextJPN: 岡部の皮肉には相手をする気にもなれない。巴は聞こえなかったふりをして、速水に向き直った。
Main.TextENG: Tomoe wasn't interested in playing along with Okabe's sarcastic banter, so she pretended not to hear it and turned to Hayami.

Main.TextJPN: 「速水さん、後で検死結果を聞かせてください。@k@vS11/28/420101163.それと、念のために運転手の聴取内容もお伺いできますでしょうか」
Main.TextENG: ``Hayami-san, please let me know the autopsy results.@k@vS11/28/420101163. And just in case, could I get a transcript of what the driver said?``

Main.TextJPN: 「ああ、わかった」
Main.TextENG: ``Sure, got it.``

Main.TextJPN: 「それと、この周辺の遺留物も、できれば――」
Main.TextENG: ``And if possible, anything left in this area...``

Main.TextJPN: 「ああ、それは私たちを通して県警に依頼してもらいたいものですね。@k@vS11/00/VT3B_kojima2020.このヤマは二課の担当なんですから、規則を遵守していただかなくては困ります」
Main.TextENG: ``Aah, if you would like anything else, you'll have to ask prefectural police through us.@k@vS11/00/VT3B_kojima2020. This incident is under the authority of the Second Division, so it could prove troublesome if you don't follow proper regulations.``

Main.TextJPN: 児島はそう言って、巴と速水の間に割って入る。
Main.TextENG: Kojima stepped between Tomoe and Hayami as he said that.

Main.TextJPN: 岡部の手前で点数を稼ぐための発言だと誰の目にも明らかだったが、巴は感情を押し隠して『そうですね』と頷いて見せた。
Main.TextENG: It was obvious to everyone that he was just saying that to earn points with Okabe, but Tomoe concealed her emotions and responded, ``Of course,`` while nodding.

Main.TextJPN: 「この件の情報提供については明日、署長の決裁を得た上で依頼をさせていただきます。@k@vS11/28/420101166.お手数ですが、ご対応をよろしくお願いします」
Main.TextENG: ``We'll submit a formal request tomorrow after getting consent from the chief.@k@vS11/28/420101166. Sorry for the trouble, and thank you for your support.``

Main.TextJPN: 「…なるほど。虎の威を借る、ですか。@k@vS11/00/VT3B_kojima2022.そこまで手柄を立てたいんですかねぇ」
Main.TextENG: ``...I see. The fox is borrowing the tiger's authority.@k@vS11/00/VT3B_kojima2022. You want the glory that badly?``

Main.TextJPN: どっちが狐だ、と巴は内心で呟くが、気に留めていないふうを装って苦笑を返す。
Main.TextENG: Tomoe silently asked herself, ``Which of us is the fox here?`` but responded with a wry smile as though she didn't care.

Main.TextJPN: しかし、続いて児島がなおも放った一言は、彼女の逆鱗に触れるものだった。
Main.TextENG: However, Kojima kept going, seemingly spurned by the threat of incurring her boss's anger.

Main.TextJPN: 「さすが、署長に妹を差し出して歓心を買っただけのことはありますな。@k@vS11/00/VT3B_kojima2024.使えるものは親でも使う…いやいや、幹部候補生ともなれば考え方が違う」
Main.TextENG: ``Naturally, all you had to do to buy the chief's favor is give him your little sister.@k@vS11/00/VT3B_kojima2024. Use everything at your disposal, even your family... Oh my, executive candidates have a completely different way of looking at things.``

Main.TextJPN: 「んだと…？」
Main.TextENG: ``What's that...?``

Main.TextJPN: 「妹は玉の輿に乗せて、自分もまたその恩恵に預かる。@k@vS11/00/VT3B_kojima2026.遠謀深慮というか、なかなかできることじゃありません」
Main.TextENG: ``Have your sister marry into power and reap the rewards yourself.@k@vS11/00/VT3B_kojima2026. That's not an easy thing to accomplish. You've got some profound foresight.``

Main.TextJPN: 「まぁもっとも、そうでもしなければ女性の立場でそれだけの地位を得ることは難しいものですからな」
Main.TextENG: ``After all, it would be extremely difficult for a woman to get into your position otherwise.``

Main.TextJPN: …普段なら、内心呆れながら聞き流していただろう。
Main.TextENG: ...Normally, she would've cursed him in her heart and paid that comment no heed.

Main.TextJPN: 社会人として、大人としての最低限の忍耐と常識は、持ち合わせているつもりだった。
Main.TextENG: As a member of society, she intended to have the minimum level of patience and common sense expected of an adult.

Main.TextJPN: でも。
Main.TextENG: But.

Main.TextJPN: でも、今日は…今日この時だけは…っ！
Main.TextENG: But today... right at this very moment...!

Main.TextJPN: 「…っせえ…」
「はい？」
「うるせぇって言ってんだよっ！@k@vS11/28/420101171.　言ってて恥ずかしくないのか、下衆野郎が！！@k@vS11/28/420101172.　自分の能力棚に上げて喧嘩売るってんなら、いつでも買ってやんぞ、あぁんっ？！」
Main.TextENG: ``I said, shut up!@k@vS11/28/420101171. Are you not ashamed of what you're saying, you shithead?!@k@vS11/28/420101172. If you're blind to your own weaknesses and looking to pick a fight, I'm ready to fight back at any moment. Well?!``

Main.TextJPN: 「だ、ダメです、南井さんっ？！」
Main.TextENG: ``D-don't do this! Minai-san?!``

Main.TextJPN: 間合いを詰めて、一変させた表情で凄んでみせたことで、言った児島も怯んで押し黙る。…藤田がとっさに腕をつかまなければ、さらに面罵を重ねていたかもしれない。
Main.TextENG: After she closed the distance between them and spoke up with a totally different tone, Kojima couldn't help but fall silent. ...If Fujita hadn't grabbed her arm so quickly, she might've taken it a step further.

Main.TextJPN: 垣内署に来た当初から、裏で噂されていたものだ。もっとも根も葉もないものである上に言いがかりとしか思えない内容であったので、巴も聞き流していた。
Main.TextENG: There were rumors going around behind the scenes ever since she came to Kakiuchi Station. But since the rumors were completely ungrounded, Tomoe paid them no heed.

Main.TextJPN: しかし、本人を目の前にして思慮も分別もあるはずの大人が冗談でも口にするとは、いったいどういう了見なのか…？
Main.TextENG: However, if someone were to make flippant remarks right in front of her rather than acting like a considerate, sensible adult, what could you expect...?

Main.TextJPN: 「南井次長、口を慎みたまえ。@k@vS11/00/421100035.年上に対してその発言は聞き捨てならんぞ」
Main.TextENG: ``Watch your tongue, Assistant Director Minai.@k@vS11/00/421100035. You mustn't speak that way to your elders.``

Main.TextJPN: 「じゃあ、今の児島補佐の発言は何だっていうんですかっ？@k@vS11/31/421200057.　明らかに南井さんへの侮辱です、訂正してください！」
Main.TextENG: ``Then what does that say about Deputy Section Chief Kojima's remarks?@k@vS11/31/421200057. He clearly insulted Minai-san, so set things right!``

Main.TextJPN: 「そういう見方も、あるということだ。@k@vS11/00/421100037.…ま、それにしても、君もとんだ猫かぶりだな。@k@vS11/00/421100038.妹が妹なら姉も姉、素性と血は争えんということか」
Main.TextENG: ``He's saying that point of view is valid.@k@vS11/00/421100037. ...Anyway, even you can't feign ignorance of that.@k@vS11/00/421100038. Sisters will be sisters, after all. There's no disputing you have the same blood and lineage.``

Main.TextJPN: その台詞だけは、巴には我慢できず。
Main.TextENG: That line breached the end of Tomoe's patience.

Main.TextJPN: 完全に、…切れた。
Main.TextENG: She completely... flew off the handle.

Main.TextJPN: 「もう一度…もう一度言ってみろ、ええッ！！@k@vS11/28/420101175.　言っていいことの区別もつかねぇのか、このクソジジィ！！」
Main.TextENG: ``One more time... Try saying that one more time, come on!!@k@vS11/28/420101175. Don't you even know what is and isn't appropriate to say, you senile old man?!``

Main.TextJPN: 「ま、待ってください南井さん！！@k@vS11/31/421200059.　止めてください、頼んますからっ！！」
Main.TextENG: ``H-hold on, Minai-san!!@k@vS11/31/421200059. Stop this, I'm begging you!!``

Main.TextJPN: 「はなせ、藤田っ！！@k@vS11/28/420101177.　こいつは…こいつはっ！！」
Main.TextENG: ``Let me go, Fujita!!@k@vS11/28/420101177. That bastard... that bastard!!``

Main.TextJPN: 後のことは、よく覚えていない。
Main.TextENG: She couldn't remember well what happened after that.

Main.TextJPN: ただ、周囲にいた捜査員たちによって、現場から叩き出された末。
Main.TextENG: But in the end, they were thrown out of the crime scene by nearby investigators.

Main.TextJPN: 『頭を冷やせ』と速水に殴られた痛みだけは、…忘れなかった。
Main.TextENG: The one thing she didn't forget... was the pain of Hayami hitting her and shouting, ``Calm down.``

Main.TextJPN: 「…で、一週間の謹慎ですか。@k@vS11/29/420400186.ほんっっと、つくづく…バカじゃないの？」
Main.TextENG: ``...So, a one-week suspension?@k@vS11/29/420400186. Honestly... you're a damn idiot, you know that?``

Main.TextJPN: 「うっさい！」
Main.TextENG: ``Oh, shut up!``

Main.TextJPN: 見舞いに持参したリンゴの皮をくるくるとむきながら、巴はベッドで上体を起こしたまどかに苛立ちをぶつけて吐き捨てる。
Main.TextENG: Tomoe vented her irritation at Madoka who was sitting in bed, while she continued peeling the apple that she had brought for Madoka.

Main.TextJPN: 目を離しても手元がくるわないのは器用だなと思いながら、まどかははぁ、とため息をつかずにはいられなかった。
Main.TextENG: Madoka couldn't help but sigh while gazing at the dexterity of her handiwork.

Main.TextJPN: 「しっかしまぁ、よくも謹慎で済んだものよねぇ。@k@vS11/29/420400188.大衆の前で、目下とはいえ年上の刑事をぐーパンチで一撃なんかして…下手すりゃ停職ものよ？」
Main.TextENG: ``But I'm shocked you got away with a temporary suspension.@k@vS11/29/420400188. A detective punching a superior officer right in view of the public... you could've been fired if that had gone south.``

Main.TextJPN: 「ぐーじゃない、パーよ！」
Main.TextENG: ``It was a slap, not a punch!``

Main.TextJPN: 「大して変わんないわよ、結局殴ってんだから。@k@vS11/29/420400190.警察は軍隊じゃないんだからね、わかってるのお姉ちゃん？」
Main.TextENG: ``That doesn't make a difference. It's assault either way.@k@vS11/29/420400190. You're a police officer, not a soldier. You understand that, right, Sis?``

Main.TextJPN: ずけずけと妹に指摘され、さすがの巴も言葉につまって押し黙る。
Main.TextENG: When her sister so bluntly pointed that out, Tomoe was completely at a loss for words.

Main.TextJPN: 確かに、頭に血が上ったとはいえ暴力沙汰に及んだことは、社会人としては最低の行為だ。決して褒められたことではない。
Main.TextENG: Indeed, even in situations where the blood rushes to your head, resorting to violence is the lowest act a member of society can stoop to.

Main.TextJPN: ただ、…少しだけ嬉しかったのは、まどかの秘密だ。
Main.TextENG: But... secretly, Madoka was a little happy about it.

Main.TextJPN: 「で、ちゃんと謝ったの？@k@vS11/29/420400192.　岡部課長に」
Main.TextENG: ``So, did you apologize properly?@k@vS11/29/420400192. To Section Chief Okabe?``

Main.TextJPN: 「……うん。@k@vS11/28/420101182.嫌味のひとつでも言われるかと思ったけど、以後気をつけろ、って言われただけ。@k@vS11/28/420101183.何か企んでるのかなぁ」
Main.TextENG: ``...Yeah.@k@vS11/28/420101182. I thought he was going to say something offensive, but he just said to be careful in the future.@k@vS11/28/420101183. I wonder if he's planning something?``

Main.TextJPN: 「単に怖かったんでしょ？@k@vS11/29/420400194.　下手なこと言ってもう一度怒らせたら、今度こそバイオレンス劇場の始まりだって」
Main.TextENG: ``Maybe he was just afraid?@k@vS11/29/420400194. If he said something careless and upset you again, it might just start another act of Violence Theater.``

Main.TextJPN: 「し、失礼ね！@k@vS11/28/420101185.　そこまで理性飛んでないわよっ！」
Main.TextENG: ``E-excuse you!@k@vS11/28/420101185. I don't fly off the handle for no reason like that!``

Main.TextJPN: 「はい、説得力まーったくありませんので」
Main.TextENG: ``Okay, you're definitely not convincing me of that.``

Main.TextJPN: 「……ふんっ」
口で言っても勝ち目無しと思ったのか、巴は不機嫌に反論を打ち切る。
Main.TextENG: Realizing there was nothing she could say to win this argument, Tomoe sullenly cut off her protest.

Main.TextJPN: そしてむき終えたリンゴを小さく切って芯を取り、小皿に並べて爪楊枝を添えると少々乱暴にまどかへ差し出した。
Main.TextENG: Then, she sliced the peeled apple into pieces, cut out the core, neatly set them on a plate, and inserted toothpicks into each before lightly holding the plate out to Madoka.

Main.TextJPN: 「あれ？　食べさせてくれないの？」
Main.TextENG: ``Huh? You're not going to feed them to me?``

Main.TextJPN: 「…あんたの肩の両側にある、二本のそれはなんだ？」
Main.TextENG: ``...You've got two arms, don't you?``

Main.TextJPN: 「えー、私重病人だしさ～」
Main.TextENG: ``Come on, I'm seriously ill~.``

Main.TextJPN: 「そんな元気な重病人、見たことも聞いたことも食べたこともないっての！@k@vS11/28/420101189.　いらないんなら私が全部食べるわよ？」
Main.TextENG: ``No seriously ill patient has ever looked, sounded, and eaten that energetically!@k@vS11/28/420101189. If you don't want them, I'll eat them all myself, ok?``

Main.TextJPN: 「どっちみち半分は食べるくせに…」
Main.TextENG: ``Says the one who's gonna eat half either way...``

Main.TextJPN: そう言いながら、まどかは小皿を受け取ると爪楊枝をついて、ひとつ口の中に頬張る。酸味の強い甘さと、適度な果肉の歯ごたえがとても美味しかった。
Main.TextENG: As she said that, Madoka took the small plate, grabbed one by the toothpick, and shoved it into her mouth. The strong sweet and sour, and the moderately soft texture of the fruit mixed together to be very delicious.

Main.TextJPN: 「う～ん、ジューシーな歯ごたえがとってもおいし～♪@k@vS11/29/420400200.　これ、病院前のスーパーのやつ？」
Main.TextENG: ``Mmm~, the juicy texture is really tasty~♪.@k@vS11/29/420400200. Did you get these from that guy at the market in front of the hospital?``

Main.TextJPN: 「駅前百貨店の地下売り場よ。@k@vS11/28/420101191.高かったんだから、よく味わって食べなさい」
Main.TextENG: ``The shop beneath the department store, right in front of the station.@k@vS11/28/420101191. They were really expensive, so you'd better savor them.``

Main.TextJPN: 「へいへい、恩に着ます」
Main.TextENG: ``Got it. I owe you one.``

Main.TextJPN: 「…もう、大丈夫なの？」
Main.TextENG: ``...Are you all right now?``

Main.TextJPN: 「うん、ごめんね。@k@vS11/29/420400203.…最近はガスコンロの火も平気だったから、ちょっと油断しちゃった。@k@vS11/29/420400204.こんなにきたの久々だし、自分でもびっくりした」
Main.TextENG: ``Yeah, sorry.@k@vS11/29/420400203. ...I'm fine around the fire from the gas stove these days, so I lowered my guard a little.@k@vS11/29/420400204. It's been a long time since I've gotten this way, so even I was surprised.``

Main.TextJPN: 巴は二つ目のリンゴを手にとって、さくさくと半月状の八つ切りにする。皮をむかないのは自分とまどかの共用だった。
Main.TextENG: Tomoe picked up another apple and cut it into eight half-moon shaped pieces. This one was unpeeled and intended to share with Madoka.

Main.TextJPN: 「……。@k@vS11/29/420400206.お姉ちゃんには、ずっと迷惑かけっぱなしだね。@k@vS11/29/420400207.自分でも早く治そうとは思ってるんだけどさ」
Main.TextENG: ``...@k@vS11/29/420400206.Sis, I've always been making trouble for you.@k@vS11/29/420400207. Even I think I need to get better soon.``

Main.TextJPN: 「それは言いっこなし。@k@vS11/28/420101195.焦ってもプラスには働かないって、お医者さんも言ってたでしょ。@k@vS11/28/420101196.それに、私はそのことで迷惑だなんて、一度も思ったことないわよ」
Main.TextENG: ``There's no need to say that.@k@vS11/28/420101195. The doctor said even if you recover quickly, you shouldn't go back to work just yet.@k@vS11/28/420101196. Besides, I've never even once thought you were a burden.``

Main.TextJPN: 「けどさ、…このままじゃやっぱり、周りの人にも嫌な思いさせちゃうし。@k@vS11/29/420400209.お姉ちゃんは事情わかってくれるから安心だけどさ、@k@vS11/29/420400210.…薫さんはどうなんだろ」
Main.TextENG: ``Still... I'm hurting the people around me like this.@k@vS11/29/420400209. Sis, you know about the circumstances so you're ok,@k@vS11/29/420400210. ...but what about Kaoru-san?``

Main.TextJPN: 「どうなんだろ…って、話してないの？」
Main.TextENG: ``What about him...? Have you not talked to him?``

Main.TextJPN: 「あ、あはは…。@k@vS11/29/420400212.折を見て話すつもりだったんだけど、今日まで、つい」
Main.TextENG: ``Ah, ahaha...@k@vS11/29/420400212. I've been planning to talk to him about it, but even today I still haven't gotten around to it.``

Main.TextJPN: 「…はぁ、まったく」
Main.TextENG: ``...Haah. Unbelievable.``

Main.TextJPN: 今度は、巴がため息をつく番だった。…まったく、普段は考えもなしに即行動のくせに、こういう時はてんでヘタレだ。
Main.TextENG: This time, it was Tomoe's turn to heave a sigh. ...Her tendency to act immediately without thinking made things difficult at times like this.

Main.TextJPN: 巴も、他人のことは言えないが。
Main.TextENG: And Tomoe couldn't act like it wasn't her issue either.

Main.TextJPN: 「前に付き合ってた彼氏とは、これがすべての原因、ってわけじゃないけど…@k@vS11/29/420400214.やっぱり、うまくいかなかったんだよね。@k@vS11/29/420400215.見慣れない人にはちょっと、引いちゃう感じらしくてさ」
Main.TextENG: ``I'm not saying this is all because of some boyfriend I was dating before, but...@k@vS11/29/420400214. In the end, things didn't go well.@k@vS11/29/420400215. People not used to it tend to be turned off by it.``

Main.TextJPN: 「飲食店のバイトも、厨房の火のせいで…あんまり長く、続かなかった。@k@vS11/29/420400217.ライターとかなら、なんとか平気なんだけどね」
Main.TextENG: ``My part-time job at the restaurant didn't last long... thanks to a fire in the kitchen.@k@vS11/29/420400217. I'm ok around lighters though.``

Main.TextJPN: 「…まどか」
Main.TextENG: ``...Madoka.``

Main.TextJPN: …今ならわかる。この子がキャバクラで働いていた理由が。
Main.TextENG: ...She understood now. The reason she insisted on working at that cabaret club.

Main.TextJPN: 酒を飲んで陽気にでもならなければ、とても働くことなどできなかったのだ…。
Main.TextENG: If she couldn't cheer herself up with alcohol, she wouldn't have been able to work...

Main.TextJPN: 「ここに入院したのだって、表向きは頭打ったってことにしてるし。@k@vS11/29/420400219.…今さら言ったら、なんて反応するかな。@k@vS11/29/420400220.酷いこと言う人じゃないことは、わかってるんだけど…」
Main.TextENG: ``When I was admitted to this hospital, the official records said I took a blow to the head.@k@vS11/29/420400219. ...If I told him now, how would he react?@k@vS11/29/420400220. I know he's not the kind of person to say cruel things, but still...``

Main.TextJPN: 真剣に思い悩むまどかの顔を見て、…ちくり、と胸が痛む。
Main.TextENG: Seeing the deeply troubled look on Madoka's face... made Tomoe's chest ache.

Main.TextJPN: やはり妹は、山沖のことを真剣に想っているのだろう。
Main.TextENG: Even after all this, her little sister was earnestly thinking about Yamaoki.

Main.TextJPN: 当の山沖が、どういうつもりなのかはまだわからないけど…。
Main.TextENG: She still didn't know what Yamaoki's intentions were, but even so...

Main.TextJPN: 「…大丈夫よ。@k@vS11/28/420101202.あの人なら、ちゃんと受け止めてくれるって」
Main.TextENG: ``...It's all right.@k@vS11/28/420101202. That man will be able to properly accept it.``

Main.TextJPN: 「そうかな…？」
Main.TextENG: ``You think so...?``

Main.TextJPN: 「そうよ」
芯を取り終わったリンゴをいくつか小皿の上に載せて、自分もひとつをかじりながら妹を元気付けるように笑って言った。
Main.TextENG: She put some more apples she finished coring on the small plate and bit into one while smiling to try to encourage her sister.

Main.TextJPN: 「他人のそういうところを面倒に思う人だったら、これまでだって父さんのことで協力してくれたりしないって。@k@vS11/28/420101205.だからちゃんと相談して、これからのことを話し合いなさい」
Main.TextENG: ``If he wasn't the kind of person who cared about other people's problems, he never would've been able to get along with Dad as much as he did.@k@vS11/28/420101205. So please, talk to him properly in the future.``

Main.TextJPN: 「私が健在なら全然ＯＫだけど、いつまでもそうとは限らないでしょ？」
Main.TextENG: ``You'll be fine as long as I'm in good health, but that's not always going to be the case, you know?``

Main.TextJPN: 「なんだそりゃ。@k@vS11/29/420400222.不吉なこといわないでよ」
Main.TextENG: ``What is this?@k@vS11/29/420400222. Don't say something so ominous.``

Main.TextJPN: 「…でも、ひょっとしたら万が一、いや億が一にもあのヤローと結婚生活でも送ることを考えたら、さっさとばらしたほうが気が楽よ」
Main.TextENG: ``...But in the one-in-10,000, no, one-in-100-million chance that does happen, I think you'd have an easier time enduring it if you were married to that man.``

Main.TextJPN: 「あんただって、それくらいのことはわかってんでしょ？」
Main.TextENG: ``You understand that much, right?``

Main.TextJPN: まどかは頷く。…わかってはいるが、姉の口から聞きたかっただけだ。
Main.TextENG: Madoka nodded her head. ...She understood all that, but she just wanted to hear her sister say it.

Main.TextJPN: 自分だけだと、なんだか言い訳をしているようにも感じるからだ。
Main.TextENG: Because it felt like she was just making excuses.

Main.TextJPN: 「…あー、なんか話したらすっきりしちゃった。@k@vS11/29/420400225.やっぱ、持つべきものは物分りのいいお姉さまだね」
Main.TextENG: ``...Aah, talking about this has made me feel better.@k@vS11/29/420400225. This is what compassionate and understanding elder sisters are for.``

Main.TextJPN: 「調子のいいこと言ってんじゃない。@k@vS11/28/420101210.それに、交際は認めても結婚なんて、よっぽど頑張らないと頷いてなんかやんないからね」
Main.TextENG: ``Don't get full of yourself.@k@vS11/28/420101210. Plus, even if I accept your marriage, you won't get my approval unless you give it your all.``

Main.TextJPN: 「うわ、まだ言ってますよこの人は…」
Main.TextENG: ``Whoa, you're still saying...``

Main.TextJPN: その時。
Main.TextENG: Just then.

Main.TextJPN: がちゃり、とノブのまわる音が聞こえて、入院服姿の男が姿を現す。
Main.TextENG: They heard the clatter of the knob turning, and then a man dressed in a hospital gown emerged.

Main.TextJPN: …見覚えのない顔だ。しかもまどかの部屋は個室で、他の入院患者が入ってくる理由などない。
Main.TextENG: ...His face didn't look familiar. And more importantly, there was no reason for another hospital patient to enter Madoka's private room.

Main.TextJPN: とすると、こいつは――？
Main.TextENG: So, what was the deal with this guy...?

Main.TextJPN: 「誰っ？」
Main.TextENG: ``Who are you?``

Main.TextJPN: 「えっ？　い、いやその…」
Main.TextENG: ``Huh? O-oh, umm...``

Main.TextJPN: 「何の用なのっ？！」
Main.TextENG: ``Do you need something?!``

Main.TextJPN: 巴は素早く身を起こすと、後ろのまどかをかばうように向き直ってジャケットの内に手を差し入れて、しまったと顔をしかめる。
Main.TextENG: Tomoe quickly rose to her feet and stood in front of Madoka to cover her, reaching her hand into her jacket, then grimaced.

Main.TextJPN: 今は謹慎中のため、常備の特殊警棒を携行していなかった。
Main.TextENG: Since she was on suspension, she wasn't carrying her usual baton.

Main.TextJPN: それでも、この距離で相手は一人…。ならば、間合いを詰めればなんとか…っ！
Main.TextENG: Still, at this distance, with one adversary... she could handle the situation if she closed the gap...!

Main.TextJPN: 「あ、えっと…あっ」
Main.TextENG: ``Oh, umm... Ah.``

Main.TextJPN: その剣呑な問いかけに対して男は戸惑った表情でうろたえながら、はっ、と何かに気付いたように、半歩室内に足を踏み入れたまま外の部屋札に目を向ける。そして、
Main.TextENG: He suddenly donned a confused and upset expression when faced with that forceful question. Then, as if he had realized something, he took a step out of the room and took a look at the room tag.

Main.TextJPN: 「あ、…す、すみません、間違えましたっ！」
Main.TextENG: ``Ah... I-I'm sorry, I was mistaken!``

Main.TextJPN: そう言い捨てるや否や、顔を真っ赤にさせてドアを閉める。やがてどたどたっと、廊下を走り去る足音がわずかに聞こえてきた。
Main.TextENG: As soon as he tossed those words out, his face turned red and he slammed the door. Then, footsteps could be heard running down the hallway.

Main.TextJPN: 「…なに、あれ？」
Main.TextENG: ``...What was that?``

Main.TextJPN: 「あー、たぶんただの部屋間違いでしょ。@k@vS11/29/420400229.薫さんも一度、ミスりかけたし」
Main.TextENG: ``Aah, he was probably just mistaken about which room this is.@k@vS11/29/420400229. Kaoru-san made the same mistake once before.``

Main.TextJPN: まどかはくすくすと笑いながら、…唖然と立ち尽くし、勇敢にも自分を守ろうとしてくれた姉の背中をちょいちょい、と突いていった。
Main.TextENG: Madoka lightly giggled... while staring at her sister's back. Tomoe was still standing in front of her trying to protect her. Then, Madoka poked her.

Main.TextJPN: …まどかの話によると、この病院は病室フロアが３階から８階までほぼ同じ構造をしているらしい。
Main.TextENG: ...According to Madoka, all the hospital rooms in this building from the third to eighth floor had the exact same layout.

Main.TextJPN: しかも、よほど工夫がないのか窓の景色や談話ルームの什器まで同じ雰囲気であるため、慣れないうちはうっかりエレベーターで階を間違えることもあるという。
Main.TextENG: And not only that, but there wasn't much variety in the furniture in the rooms or the view out the windows, so if you weren't used to it you could easily mistake which floor you're on after exiting the elevator.

Main.TextJPN: 以前見舞いに来た山沖も、間違えて一つ下の階の病室にうっかりノックなしで入りそうになったとのことだった。
Main.TextENG: Apparently Yamaoki came to visit earlier and mistakenly barged into another room on a lower floor without even knocking.

Main.TextJPN: 「…ああ、そういえば」
Main.TextENG: ``...Now that you mention it, yeah.``

Main.TextJPN: 確かに言われてみれば巴も、さっきナースステーションに果物ナイフを借りに行った時がそうだった。
Main.TextENG: Indeed, after bringing it up, Tomoe also noticed the same thing earlier when she went to the nurse's station to borrow a fruit knife.

Main.TextJPN: あいにく貸し出し用のものが全て出払っている、と看護師に言われて二階下の詰め所まで取りに行ったのだが、あまりにも同じ構造であったため一瞬この階でいいのか、と迷ってしまった。
Main.TextENG: Unfortunately, all of them were loaned out. But the nurse said she could get another if she tried going two floors downstairs. But Tomoe did momentarily worry she was on the wrong floor, since it had the exact same layout.

Main.TextJPN: まぁ、入院患者向けの病室が多い総合病院にはよくある話らしいが…もう少し利用者のことを考えてもらいたい、と巴は内心ぼやいたものだ――。
Main.TextENG: Well, that seemed to be a relatively normal situation for general hospitals with a large number of patient rooms... but Tomoe wished they'd give a little more consideration for the people who actually had to use them.

Main.TextJPN: 「それにしても、入院患者が迷うってのはよっぽどなのね。@k@vS11/28/420101219.こんなことなら、部屋に鍵でもないと不安よ」
Main.TextENG: ``Anyway, I'm sure a lot of hospital patients get lost.@k@vS11/28/420101219. In which case, it bothers me that these rooms don't have locks.``

Main.TextJPN: 「あははは、大丈夫だって。@k@vS11/29/420400231.さっきの患者さん、なんか眠たそうだったからうっかりしてただけだよ」
Main.TextENG: ``Ahahaha, it's all right.@k@vS11/29/420400231. That patient earlier just made a careless mistake because he was tired.``

Main.TextJPN: 「…お姉ちゃん？」
突然。
Main.TextENG: Suddenly.

Main.TextJPN: リンゴの最後の残りを手に取りかけた姿勢のまま、巴は固まって動かなくなる。
Main.TextENG: Tomoe completely froze in place, with her hand still hovering in the air reaching for the last apple piece.

Main.TextJPN: そして次の瞬間はっ、と何かを思いついたように立ち上がると、椅子が後ろに倒れたことにも気付かず病室を出て行った。
Main.TextENG: And the next moment, she rose to her feet as though she had realized something, then began heading out of the hospital room without even noticing that the chair had fallen down behind her.

Main.TextJPN: 「ちょ、ちょっとどうしたの？@k@vS11/29/420400234.　お姉ちゃんってばっ…」
Main.TextENG: ``W-wait, what's wrong?@k@vS11/29/420400234. Sis...?``

Main.TextJPN: 「…あ、すみません！@k@vS11/28/420101222.　垣内署の南井と申しますが、一課長の本条さんをお願いします」
Main.TextENG: ``...Ah, excuse me!@k@vS11/28/420101222. My name is Minai from Kakiuchi Station. I would like to speak with the First Division section chief, Honjou-san.``

Main.TextJPN: 行き先を示した時刻表が、パタパタと切り替わってゆく。
Main.TextENG: The timetable listing her destination pattered as she put it away.

Main.TextJPN: そしてようやく、搭乗する予定の便が『手続き開始』と表示された。
Main.TextENG: And at last, the flight she planned to board displayed a ``now commencing boarding`` status.

Main.TextJPN: 「…さて」
Main.TextENG: ``...Now then.``

Main.TextJPN: 紙コップに入っていたワインの残りを飲み干してから、ゆっくりと立ち上がって隣の席に置いていたセカンドバッグを手に持つ。
Main.TextENG: After drinking the rest of the wine in her paper cup, she slowly stood up and grabbed the bag from the seat next to her.

Main.TextJPN: スーツケースなどの大きな荷物はすでに預けてあるので、身の回りは軽いものだった。
Main.TextENG: She had already checked her suitcase and larger luggage, so her personal belongings were relatively light.

Main.TextJPN: 「ふん…」
搭乗口にごった返す乗客の列を一瞥して、かすかに嘲笑する。
Main.TextENG: She faintly sneered at the crowd of passengers lined up at the boarding gate.

Main.TextJPN: 彼らの席はエコノミーの狭苦しい、貧しい席だ。自分の座るファーストクラスとは作りも、サービスも違う。
Main.TextENG: Their seats were the poor, cramped economy seats. The services and accommodations were completely different from the first-class seat she would be sitting in.

Main.TextJPN: そんな中で肩を縮こまらせて、数時間のフライトに耐えねばならないとは哀れなものだ…。
Main.TextENG: Such a pity, sitting with your shoulders shrunk together, and having to endure it for a multiple hour long flight...

Main.TextJPN: そう内心で呟きながら近くのゴミ箱に紙コップを捨てて、がらんと空いたファーストクラス用のゲートへ悠然と足を向けた。
Main.TextENG: She muttered that in her head while throwing the paper cup into a nearby trash can, then turned to face the completely empty first-class gate.

Main.TextJPN: そこへ――。
Main.TextENG: Right then...

Main.TextJPN: 「…ほぉ、マカオへバカンスですか。@k@vS11/00/VT3B_honjo2062.いい～っすなぁ」
Main.TextENG: ``...Hoh, vacationing in Macao, eh?@k@vS11/00/VT3B_honjo2062. Sounds lovely~.``

Main.TextJPN: 突然の背後からの声に振り返ると、厚手のコートを着た初老の男がにこにこと愛想よく近づいてくるのが見える。
Main.TextENG: Looking back toward the voice that suddenly called out to her from behind, she found an elderly man in a thick coat approaching her with a pleasant smile on his face.

Main.TextJPN: 一見、くたびれたサラリーマンの管理職のような風体。
Main.TextENG: At a quick glance, he was styled like a worn-down business manager.

Main.TextJPN: しかし、その職業が何であるか、一度会ったことのある彼女にはよくわかっていた。
Main.TextENG: However, she understood well what his occupation was since they had met once before.

Main.TextJPN: 「…あなたは」
「お久しぶりです。@k@vS11/00/VT3B_honjo2064.茨城県警捜査一課の、本条です」
Main.TextENG: ``Long time no see.@k@vS11/00/VT3B_honjo2064. It's Honjou, from the First Investigation Division of the Ibaraki prefectural police department.``

Main.TextJPN: そう言って本条と名乗った男は、内ポケットから黒い手帳を取り出して見せる。
Main.TextENG: The man who addressed himself as Honjou pulled a black notebook out of his jacket pocket and held it up to her.

Main.TextJPN: それを見た瞬間、…平沼陽子は血液が凍りついたようになって、全身に悪寒が駆け巡るのを感じた。
Main.TextENG: The moment she saw it... a chill ran through Youko Hiranuma's body, as every ounce of blood froze over.

Main.TextJPN: 「搭乗手続き、まだ混んでるみでえだべ。@k@vS11/00/VT3B_honjo2066.それまでちっと、お話聞いてもれぇませんか？」
Main.TextENG: ``The check-in area still looks pretty crowded.@k@vS11/00/VT3B_honjo2066. Do ya mind having a small chat until it clears up?``

Main.TextJPN: 「…なんでしょうか」
Main.TextENG: ``...About what?``

Main.TextJPN: 「いやぁ、大したことじゃねぇんだべ。@k@vS11/00/VT3B_honjo2068.…あなだにずっと確かめでおぎだがったごどがあったんですが、今の今まで忘れでいで…たははっ」
Main.TextENG: ``Well, it's nothing major.@k@vS11/00/VT3B_honjo2068. ...There was something that's been on my mind for a long time, but I forgot about it until right this moment... Tahahah.``

Main.TextJPN: 「…なにを、ですか？」
Main.TextENG: ``...And what would that be?``

Main.TextJPN: 「前に、お伺いした話のおっ繰り返しです。@k@vS11/00/VT3B_honjo2070.…あなだ、澤村公平くんの発見の時、最初に警察に連絡して、それがら担当医の先生を呼びだじだ…でしたっけ？」
Main.TextENG: ``This may be a repeat of our earlier conversation.@k@vS11/00/VT3B_honjo2070. ...When Kouhei Sawamura-kun was discovered, you first contacted the police, and then the doctor in charge... Isn't that right?``

Main.TextJPN: 「ええ、そうですが…」
Main.TextENG: ``Yes, that's right...``

Main.TextJPN: 「間違いなかっぺ？」
Main.TextENG: ``You're not mistaken about that?``

Main.TextJPN: 「だから、そうです」
Main.TextENG: ``As I said, that's right.``

Main.TextJPN: 多少苛立ちを込めて、平沼は繰り返した。
Main.TextENG: There was a hint of irritation in Hiranuma's voice as she repeated that response.

Main.TextJPN: いったいこの男は、何を聞こうとしているのだろう…？
Main.TextENG: What on earth was this man hoping to hear...?

Main.TextJPN: 「だいたい、それが何か？」
Main.TextENG: ``And what of it, anyway?``

Main.TextJPN: 「いやね、…なんだが、おがしぐねえっすが？@k@vS11/00/VT3B_honjo2073.　なんで８階から見下ろしただげで、澤村くんが転落したってわがったんです？」
Main.TextENG: ``Well... isn't something odd?@k@vS11/00/VT3B_honjo2073. How did you know Sawamura-kun had fallen to his death if all you did was look down from the eighth floor?``

Main.TextJPN: 「…はぁ？@k@vS11/00/VT3B_hiranu2119.　そんなの、当然じゃないですか。@k@vS11/00/VT3B_hiranu2120.窓が開いてて、さっきまで病室にいた人が外の地面に横たわっていたら、普通そう考えるのが自然でしょう？」
Main.TextENG: ``...Huh?@k@vS11/00/VT3B_hiranu2119. Isn't that perfectly natural?@k@vS11/00/VT3B_hiranu2120. The window was open and the person who was in the hospital room earlier was laying on the ground outside. Isn't it normal to think so?``

Main.TextJPN: 「ええ、確かにそのとおり。@k@vS11/00/VT3B_honjo2075.…でもね、ちょっと腑に落ちないんですよ。@k@vS11/00/VT3B_honjo2076.だったらなんで、彼を助けることを第一に考えなかったのか、ってね」
Main.TextENG: ``Yes, exactly.@k@vS11/00/VT3B_honjo2075. ...But there's something that doesn't quite make sense.@k@vS11/00/VT3B_honjo2076. If that was the case, why wasn't your first thought to consider helping him?``

Main.TextJPN: 本条は笑みを消して、鋭い眼光で平沼を見据える。
Main.TextENG: The smile on Honjou's face vanished as he stared at Hiranuma with a piercing glare.

Main.TextJPN: …気がつくと彼女の周りには、刑事らしきスーツ姿の男たちが退路を塞ぐように立っていた。
Main.TextENG: ...That was when she noticed other men dressed in suits like detectives were standing to block the exits.

Main.TextJPN: 「８階からの転落。@k@vS11/00/VT3B_honjo2078.常識で考えれば即死しでもおがしぐねえ高さだ」
Main.TextENG: ``A fall from the eighth floor.@k@vS11/00/VT3B_honjo2078. If you think about it logically, it's high enough to cause instant death.``

Main.TextJPN: 「…ですがね、普通の医療現場の人ならだどえ１％でも、助かる可能性にかげるはずです」
Main.TextENG: ``...But, for professionals in the medical field, normally they'd rush to save someone even if there was only a 1% chance of success.``

Main.TextJPN: 「だどしたら、最初に連絡を取るのは救急で、@k@vS11/00/VT3B_honjo2081.…警察に連絡するのは死亡が確認されでがら。@k@vS11/00/VT3B_honjo2082.担当医なんで、一番後です。@k@vS11/00/VT3B_honjo2083.…違いますが？」
Main.TextENG: ``In which case, shouldn't your first step have been to call emergency services,@k@vS11/00/VT3B_honjo2081. ...and call the police only after you confirmed he was dead.@k@vS11/00/VT3B_honjo2082. And the doctor in charge would be the last person to contact.@k@vS11/00/VT3B_honjo2083. ...Or am I mistaken?``

Main.TextJPN: 「それは、…あの時は私も、動転していて…」
Main.TextENG: ``That's because... I was frightened and shaken up at the time...``

Main.TextJPN: 「それから、澤村くんの部屋が密室で、鍵がかかってだって話ですが…。@k@vS11/00/VT3B_honjo2085.確かにあなだの言うどおり、防犯カメラには最後にあなだが彼の部屋を訪れでがら、ずっと誰も彼の部屋さ入ってながった」
Main.TextENG: ``And then there's the story that Sawamura-kun's room was a closed room, since the door was locked...@k@vS11/00/VT3B_honjo2085. Indeed, the cameras showed that nobody entered his room after you, just as you said.``

Main.TextJPN: 「だがら彼が鍵をかげで、部屋から誤って落っこぢだが、自殺したって話になってっぺ」
Main.TextENG: ``So, he locked the door before accidentally falling from the room, but then you said he committed suicide.``

Main.TextJPN: 「しがしね、あそごの鍵はかげでがら閉めるようになってます。@k@vS11/00/VT3B_honjo2088.っちゅうごどは、密室殺人の条件は崩れるんです。@k@vS11/00/VT3B_honjo2089.部屋を出てった犯人が、鍵を閉めるごどができるってごどですがら」
Main.TextENG: ``But the door could've been locked after it was closed.@k@vS11/00/VT3B_honjo2088. In which case, the condition for the closed room falls apart.@k@vS11/00/VT3B_honjo2089. It's possible that the perpetrator locked the door after leaving the room, using the key.``

Main.TextJPN: 「つまり、逆に言えばごうです。@k@vS11/00/VT3B_honjo2091.誰かに自殺を装って殺されだのだどしたら、@k@vS11/00/VT3B_honjo2092.一番怪しいのは最後に彼と会った、あなだ――」
Main.TextENG: ``Or to put it another way.@k@vS11/00/VT3B_honjo2091. If someone wanted to murder him and disguise it as a suicide,@k@vS11/00/VT3B_honjo2092. the most suspicious individual is the last person to meet him. You...``

Main.TextJPN: 「な、なんですかそれはっ！」
Main.TextENG: ``Wh-what is this?!``

Main.TextJPN: 平沼は激昂して、手に持っていたセカンドバッグを床にたたきつける。フックが外れて、開いたファスナーの隙間から化粧品や小道具がいくつかこぼれ落ちた。
Main.TextENG: Hiranuma shouted in rage and dropped her carry-on bag to the floor. The clasp came undone and the bag split open, spilling some cosmetics and small articles to the floor.

Main.TextJPN: 「それじゃ、私が彼を窓から突き落としたとでも言うんですか？@k@vS11/00/VT3B_hiranu2127.　無茶を言わないでください、彼と私じゃ体格差がまるで違うんですよ？」
Main.TextENG: ``Then, you're suggesting I threw him out the window?@k@vS11/00/VT3B_hiranu2127. Don't be absurd. You're aware of the difference between our body types, right?``

Main.TextJPN: 「どうやって自分以上の背格好の人を窓まで連れて、あまつさえ落とすことができるって言うんですか？@k@vS11/00/VT3B_hiranu2129.　逆に抵抗されて、私が落とされるだけです！」
Main.TextENG: ``How can you suggest that I brought someone taller than myself to that window, much less threw him out of it?@k@vS11/00/VT3B_hiranu2129. It would be the other way around. He'd fight back, and I'd be the one thrown out!``

Main.TextJPN: 「まぁ、普通に考えればそうです。@k@vS11/00/VT3B_honjo2094.ただ、…こうも考えられなかっぺ？@k@vS11/00/VT3B_honjo2095.　彼が自ら窓に近づいで、窓の縁のとごろに上がったど。@k@vS11/00/VT3B_honjo2096.そうすればあなだは軽く突き飛ばすだげで、彼は転落する…」
Main.TextENG: ``Well, normally you'd think so.@k@vS11/00/VT3B_honjo2094. But... what if you think about it like this?@k@vS11/00/VT3B_honjo2095. He approached the window on his own and climbed to the ledge.@k@vS11/00/VT3B_honjo2096. If that were the case, you'd be able to throw him off with just a light push...``

Main.TextJPN: 「そ、それこそ意味がわかりません！@k@vS11/00/VT3B_hiranu2131.　なぜ彼が、そんな危険な真似を自分からするんですか？」
Main.TextENG: ``I-I don't understand that meaning of that!@k@vS11/00/VT3B_hiranu2131. Why would he put himself in such a dangerous situation?``

Main.TextJPN: 「そりゃ簡単です。@k@vS11/00/VT3B_honjo2098.…危険だどは、思わながったがらだべ」
Main.TextENG: ``That's simple.@k@vS11/00/VT3B_honjo2098. ...It's because he didn't think it was dangerous.``

Main.TextJPN: …平沼は、息を、飲む。
Main.TextENG: ...Hiranuma caught her breath.

Main.TextJPN: 知っている…。この男は、自分の仕掛けを、すべて、知っているッ…！
Main.TextENG: He knew... This man knew all her machinations...!

Main.TextJPN: 「澤村くんは発見前、検温を済ませで眠ってだって言ってましたっぺ。@k@vS11/00/VT3B_honjo2100.…そんで、第一発見者の尾崎渚さんが見舞いさ来るまでの間に、警報機の誤作動があっだ」
Main.TextENG: ``You said that before Sawamura-kun was discovered, he had his temperature taken and then went to sleep.@k@vS11/00/VT3B_honjo2100. ...Then, there was a malfunction with the alarm just before the first to discover the body, Nagisa Ozaki, came to visit him.``

Main.TextJPN: 「すぐに、看護師さんたぢが各部屋に回って患者さんたぢに説明しでいだぞですが、@k@vS11/00/VT3B_honjo2102.…あなだは、澤村くんには違うごど言った。@k@vS11/00/VT3B_honjo2103.…たどえば、『火事よ、逃げなさい！』と」
Main.TextENG: ``Shortly thereafter, the nurses visited every patient's room to explain the situation...@k@vS11/00/VT3B_honjo2102. but you told Sawamura-kun something else.@k@vS11/00/VT3B_honjo2103. ...Something like, ``There's a fire! Get out of here!````

Main.TextJPN: 「そしで、あなだは窓のほうを指差す。@k@vS11/00/VT3B_honjo2105.それを聞いた澤村くんは、寝起きで意識が混濁しでいだだめに自分の部屋が１階だど勘違いした。@k@vS11/00/VT3B_honjo2106.元々彼の部屋は、８階に移る１週間前までは１階でしたがらね」
Main.TextENG: ``And then, you pointed toward the window.@k@vS11/00/VT3B_honjo2105. When Sawamura-kun heard that, he was confused from just waking up and thought he was still in his room on the first floor.@k@vS11/00/VT3B_honjo2106. His room was originally on the first floor, and he had only moved to the eighth floor a week before.``

Main.TextJPN: 「しがも、以前に窓から逃げだごどがあるだめさ、外さ出るさは廊下よりも窓のほうが早いと思い込んだ」
Main.TextENG: ``And not only that, but his old room was physically located somewhere that escaping through the window would be faster than running down the hallway.``

Main.TextJPN: 「そんで@bアッパトッパ.@<あたふた@>しながら窓に近づいで縁に足をかげだどごろで、ようやぐこごが８階であったごどに気付く」
Main.TextENG: ``So, as he hastily approached the window and climbed up to the ledge, he was surprised to notice he was actually on the eighth floor.``

Main.TextJPN: 「…そんで落っこぢめえど両手でサッシをつがんだが、その後ろがらあなだが突き飛ばし、支えぎれずさそのまま落下した…」
Main.TextENG: ``...When he noticed he was about to fall, he grabbed the window frame with both hands. But when you approached him from behind and pushed, he didn't have the means to support himself so he fell...``

Main.TextJPN: 「しょ、証拠はあるのですか…？」
Main.TextENG: ``I-is there any evidence of this...?``

Main.TextJPN: 「これ、…わがりますか？@k@vS11/00/VT3B_honjo2111.　サッシについだ、澤村くんの爪の跡です」
Main.TextENG: ``Here... do you know what these are?@k@vS11/00/VT3B_honjo2111. They're markings from Sawamura-kun's fingernails on the window frame.``

Main.TextJPN: 「普通高層階から飛び降りようど考える時は、左右か、下のみに指紋と爪痕がつぐもの。@k@vS11/00/VT3B_honjo2113.とごろが彼の場合、右と、下に爪痕がある。@k@vS11/00/VT3B_honjo2114.しがも右には抵抗した際に爪をはがしたのが、血痕も発見されだ…」
Main.TextENG: ``Normally, when someone is considering jumping from a high place, the fingerprints and nail marks appear just on the bottom, rather than the left and right sides.@k@vS11/00/VT3B_honjo2113. But in his case, there were nail markings on the right side and the bottom.@k@vS11/00/VT3B_honjo2114. Moreover, he clenched so strongly on the right side that it peeled his nails off, leaving blood stains behind...``

Main.TextJPN: 「そ、そんなので、断定なんて…」
Main.TextENG: ``Y-You can't tell that for sure...``

Main.TextJPN: 「あどね、…彼の爪の間に、彼以外の血液型の皮膚片がありましでね。@k@vS11/00/VT3B_honjo2116.その血液型はＲＨ－のＡ型。@k@vS11/00/VT3B_honjo2117.そしであなだも、確か…」
Main.TextENG: ``Also... we found traces of skin of a different blood type beneath his nails.@k@vS11/00/VT3B_honjo2116. The blood type was A-.@k@vS11/00/VT3B_honjo2117. And sure enough, that's your type too...``

Main.TextJPN: 「その手袋、取ってもらえませんか？@k@vS11/00/VT3B_honjo2119.　あなだの手のどぢらがに、澤村くんと争ったどぎにできだ傷痕があるはずです」
Main.TextENG: ``Would you mind taking off those gloves?@k@vS11/00/VT3B_honjo2119. One of your hands should have a scar from your fight with Sawamura-kun.``

Main.TextJPN: 「県警まで、ご同行願います」
Main.TextENG: ``Please come with me to prefectural police headquarters.``

Main.TextJPN: 平沼はうなだれたまま、その場にがっくりと崩れ落ちる。
Main.TextENG: Hiranuma hung her head, then fell to her knees.

Main.TextJPN: その様子を見て取った本条は背後の刑事に無言で頷き、彼らはその合図を受けて彼女の両脇に回り込んだ。
Main.TextENG: After seeing that, Honjou silently nodded to the detectives behind her. On that signal, they moved around to both sides of her.

Main.TextJPN: しかし。
Main.TextENG: However.

Main.TextJPN: 「……。@k@vS11/00/VT3B_hiranu2141.く、くくくくくくくくく。@k@vS11/00/VT3B_hiranu2142.けけけけけけけけけけけけけけけけ」
Main.TextENG: ``...@k@vS11/00/VT3B_hiranu2141.Heh, hehehehehehehehehe.@k@vS11/00/VT3B_hiranu2142. Hahahahahahahahahahahahahahahaha.``

Main.TextJPN: 突然。
Main.TextENG: Suddenly.

Main.TextJPN: 平沼は低く不気味な声で@bワラ.@<嗤@>い始めると、瞳孔が開いた顔を振り仰いで哄笑しながら立ち上がった。
Main.TextENG: Hiranuma sneered and began laughing in a low, creepy voice. Then, she looked up with her eyes open wide while still cackling.

Main.TextJPN: 「くひゃははははははははははっっ！！！@k@vS11/00/VT3B_hiranu2144.　ぐぎゃげらぐべびぎょげががががががががッッ！！！」
Main.TextENG: ``Gyahahahahahahahahahaha!!!@k@vS11/00/VT3B_hiranu2144. Gugyageragubebigyogehahahahahahahaha!!!``

Main.TextJPN: 「なっ？　こ、こいつっ…！」
Main.TextENG: ``Wha? W-what is this...?!``

Main.TextJPN: 「関、本多！@k@vS11/00/VT3B_honjo2124.　被疑者確保、取り押さえろ！@k@vS11/00/VT3B_honjo2125.　両手を自由にさせるな！！」
Main.TextENG: ``Seki, Honda!@k@vS11/00/VT3B_honjo2124. Restrain the suspect!@k@vS11/00/VT3B_honjo2125. Don't let either of her hands free!!``

Main.TextJPN: 「ひ、ひひゃははははははははは…！！@k@vS11/00/VT3B_hiranu2146.　ぐひゃひへあがばばばばばばばばッッ！！」
Main.TextENG: ``Hi, hihyahahahahahahahahaha...!!@k@vS11/00/VT3B_hiranu2146. Gwaahiheagahahahahahahahaha!!``

Main.TextJPN: 平沼は髪を振り乱して奇声をあげながら、セカンドバッグから出て転がった果物ナイフを拾い上げると、でたらめに四方へ振り回して刑事たちを威嚇する。
Main.TextENG: Hiranuma shook her hair about and cried out in a strange voice while picking up the fruit knife that had fallen out of her carry-on bag. Then, she swung it in all directions in an effort to intimidate the detectives.

Main.TextJPN: そして、その凶刃から逃れようと刑事が距離を置いた隙を見測って、窓際に駆け寄って背を預けた。
Main.TextENG: And then, noticing the gap between the detectives she managed to open with her blade, she ran toward the back window in an effort to escape.

Main.TextJPN: そして――。
Main.TextENG: Then...

Main.TextJPN: 「がッッ！！@k@vS11/00/VT3B_hiranu2148.　…ひゃ、ひ、へひひゃッ…！！」
Main.TextENG: ``Gah!!@k@vS11/00/VT3B_hiranu2148. ...Hya, hi, hehihyah...!!``

Main.TextJPN: そのナイフを自分の喉へと突き立て、…何度も、何度も刺し貫く。
Main.TextENG: She plunged the knife into her own throat... and stabbed it in over and over again.

Main.TextJPN: ごぼっ、と粘度の高い液体があふれ出す音が鈍く響いて、…床には真っ赤な血がおびただしく流れ広がってゆく。
Main.TextENG: The dull gurgling sound of an overflowing viscous liquid rang out... while a stream of bright red blood fell down to the floor.

Main.TextJPN: どこからともなく、…絹を引き裂くような、悲痛の叫喚。
Main.TextENG: Out of nowhere... a grief-stricken scream came out, strong enough to tear through silk.

Main.TextJPN: 取り囲む刑事たちは皆、驚愕で固まって。…本条ですら、嘔吐をもよおしかける凄惨な光景だった。
Main.TextENG: The surrounding detectives all froze in horror. ...Even Honjou felt the urge to vomit at the miserable sight.

Main.TextJPN: 「っ、本多ぁ、救急隊に連絡！！@k@vS11/00/VT3B_honjo2129.　蘇生器具とレスキューキットを持って来させろッ！！！」
Main.TextENG: ``H-Hondaa, call the first-aid squad!!@k@vS11/00/VT3B_honjo2129. Tell them to bring resuscitation tools and a rescue kit!!!``

Main.TextJPN: 「自殺っ？！@k@vS11/28/420101224.　…それで、被疑者はどうなりました？」
Main.TextENG: ``Suicide?!@k@vS11/28/420101224. ...So, what became of the suspect?``

Main.TextJPN: 『…申し訳ねえ。@k@vS11/00/VT3B_honjo2131.応急で救命措置を施しで、病院へ運び込んだが…だめだった』
Main.TextENG: ``...I'm sorry.@k@vS11/00/VT3B_honjo2131. Emergency first aid was administered and she was transported to a hospital... but it was all for nothing.``

Main.TextJPN: 本条からの電話を受けて、巴は予想もしなかった顛末に声を失う。
Main.TextENG: Tomoe was so shocked she was at a loss for words after hearing that from Honjou over the phone.

Main.TextJPN: 思い余っての自殺は、当然考えられないことではなかった。本条たちもおそらく、それを想定していただろう。
Main.TextENG: Losing control and turning to suicide wasn't out of the question, naturally. Honjou and the others probably felt the same way.

Main.TextJPN: しかし、…彼らの動作を止めたのは平沼の豹変、いや惑乱とも呼べるほどの異常な変貌だった。
Main.TextENG: But... the men froze when they witnessed Hiranuma's strange, or rather, completely baffling transformation.

Main.TextJPN: 奇声を上げて、@bワラ.@<嗤@>い喚きながら暴れ回り、…最後は自らの喉に包丁を突きたてて、絶命。
Main.TextENG: Shrieking in a weird voice and going mad with laughter... before finally piercing her throat with a knife, and dying.

Main.TextJPN: まともな精神状態なら、自決にしてもその手段を選ぶことはないだろう。
Main.TextENG: Nobody in decent mental health would ever turn to that means, even if they intended self-harm.

Main.TextJPN: もはや疾病による発作か、それとも追い詰められた末に錯乱をきたした類のものとしかいえなかった。
Main.TextENG: Was it a spasm induced by some illness? Or was she at her wits' end after being cornered and acting in a panic? Tomoe couldn't say.

Main.TextJPN: 「平沼陽子が、何かの薬物を服用していたという話はあったのですか？」
Main.TextENG: ``Have you heard if Youko Hiranuma was taking any sort of drugs?``

Main.TextJPN: 『いや、少なくども現時点ではねえ。@k@vS11/00/VT3B_honjo2133.…勤務態度も普通で、同僚や知人、おらげ近隣の住人の誰に聞いても『信じられない』の一点張りだ。@k@vS11/00/VT3B_honjo2134.意図的にかばってるようには見えねえな』
Main.TextENG: ``No, at least not at the moment.@k@vS11/00/VT3B_honjo2133. ...Her colleagues, acquaintances, and neighbors said she had a normal working attitude. When asked about it, all they could say was, ``I can't believe it.``@k@vS11/00/VT3B_honjo2134. And it didn't seem like they were covering for her.``

Main.TextJPN: 「…なのに、なんでそんな最期を」
Main.TextENG: ``...But why turn to that in the end?``

Main.TextJPN: 『わがらん。@k@vS11/00/VT3B_honjo2136.…いや、本当にわがんねえんだ。@k@vS11/00/VT3B_honjo2137.平沼陽子がなぜ、澤村公平を殺したっで動機もわがんねぇ』
Main.TextENG: ``I dunno.@k@vS11/00/VT3B_honjo2136. ...Honestly, I have absolutely no idea.@k@vS11/00/VT3B_honjo2137. I don't understand Youko Hiranuma's motive for killing Kouhei Sawamura either.``

Main.TextJPN: 『それに、巴ちゃんが言っていだ尾崎渚の殺人事件に彼女が関与しでいだが…全部、闇ん中だ。@k@vS11/00/VT3B_honjo2139.家宅捜索を行っても、それらしぎ証拠物件は何もながった。@k@vS11/00/VT3B_honjo2140.…完全に、八方塞がりだべ』
Main.TextENG: ``And if she was somehow involved with the Nagisa Ozaki murder case you were investigating... now everything is in the dark.@k@vS11/00/VT3B_honjo2139. Even after searching her house, we didn't find any evidence.@k@vS11/00/VT3B_honjo2140. ...We're completely cut off in all directions.``

Main.TextJPN: 「…本条さん」
Main.TextENG: ``...Honjou-san.``

Main.TextJPN: 本条がここまでさじを投げて話すのも、珍しい。いつもなら何か、ひとつでも突破口を見つけて持論を展開してみせるものだが…。
Main.TextENG: It was a rare occasion for Honjou to speak as though he had given up. He always tried to search for a breakthrough that could lead to a new theory...

Main.TextJPN: 逆に言えば、…それだけ犯人像が全く見えない事件ということだ。
Main.TextENG: In other words... this was the kind of incident where the culprit could never be found.

Main.TextJPN: 「私のほうでも、いくつか探ってみます。@k@vS11/28/420101230.また何かありましたら、連絡をいただけますか」
Main.TextENG: ``I'll do what I can on my end to keep searching.@k@vS11/28/420101230. Can you contact me if anything else turns up?``

Main.TextJPN: 『…巴ちゃん』
Main.TextENG: ``...Tomoe-chan.``

Main.TextJPN: 「はい？」
『これは、おらの勘だが。@k@vS11/00/VT3B_honjo2143.…この事件の裏、お前さんが思う以上に、深いぞ』
Main.TextENG: ``This is just a hunch, but...@k@vS11/00/VT3B_honjo2143. the truth behind this incident runs deeper than you think.``

Main.TextJPN: 「…わかってます」
Main.TextENG: ``...I understand that.``

Main.TextJPN: 『安易に言うな。@k@vS11/00/VT3B_honjo2145.それが、わがってねえっていうんだ』
Main.TextENG: ``Don't say that so casually.@k@vS11/00/VT3B_honjo2145. That's the same as saying you don't understand at all.``

Main.TextJPN: ほとんど反射的に答えた巴に対し、本条はそういってたしなめた。
Main.TextENG: Honjou said that in response to Tomoe's almost reflexive answer.

Main.TextJPN: 『男子学生が殺され、その犯人が自殺。@k@vS11/00/VT3B_honjo2147.…それだげなら、ただの享楽殺人か猟奇殺人だ』
Main.TextENG: ``A male student was murdered and the culprit committed suicide.@k@vS11/00/VT3B_honjo2147. ...If that was all there was to it, it could simply be a case of a murder committed for personal enjoyment or to sate curiosity.``

Main.TextJPN: 『んだげんど、今までそんな嗜好も異常も見られながった人間が突然豹変しで人を襲い、そんで自分もぶっ壊す。@k@vS11/00/VT3B_honjo2149.…そっただ事件、今まで存在しでいだが？』
Main.TextENG: ``But a person who exhibited no such abnormalities until now suddenly changed and attacked another person, then herself.@k@vS11/00/VT3B_honjo2149. ...Has there ever been an incident like this before?``

Main.TextJPN: 「……。@k@vS11/28/420101234.いえ、欧米の事件記録にもそんな事例は、ありません」
Main.TextENG: ``...@k@vS11/28/420101234.No, there are no cases like this, even among Western case records.``

Main.TextJPN: 猟奇殺人を行う犯人には、必ずそれに関係する嗜好、あるいはそう思考するに至った環境が存在する。
Main.TextENG: Criminals who kill to sate curiosity always have some sort of preference or an established environment that led them to that thought.

Main.TextJPN: その条件を満たさない人間が異常行動を起こす可能性は皆無に等しい、いや絶無といってもよかった。
Main.TextENG: There's no chance of a person turning to aberrant behavior without that.

Main.TextJPN: 『…気ぃつげろよ、巴ちゃん。@k@vS11/00/VT3B_honjo2151.これは、お前さん一人が片手間でなんとがなるような代物じゃねえ。@k@vS11/00/VT3B_honjo2152.その辺をよぐ、考えでな』
Main.TextENG: ``...Be careful, Tomoe-chan.@k@vS11/00/VT3B_honjo2151. This isn't the kind of thing you should handle on your own in your spare time.@k@vS11/00/VT3B_honjo2152. Always be cognizant of your surroundings.``
``Right.@k@vS11/28/420101236. ...I'll keep that in the back of my mind, always.``

Main.TextJPN: そして巴は電話を切った。
Main.TextENG: Then, Tomoe hung up the phone.

Main.TextJPN: 「一人で、片手間では、…か」
Main.TextENG: ``Shouldn't handle on my own...huh?``

Main.TextJPN: 確かに、そのとおりだろう。
Main.TextENG: That was certainly true.

Main.TextJPN: しかし、すでに自分の知っている子が二人も犠牲になっているのだ。
Main.TextENG: But two children that she knew had already fallen victim.

Main.TextJPN: それを、八方塞がりだからと言って見逃すのか…？
Main.TextENG: Could she dismiss the case as being blocked on all sides, just as he said...?

Main.TextJPN: 今までそんな嗜好も異常も見られなかった人間が、突然豹変して人を襲う異常な事件…。
Main.TextENG: There was another incident where a person not showing any abnormalities suddenly changed and attacked a person...

Main.TextJPN: さっきは『ない』と思って納得した。…だがまさしく、竜宮礼奈の事件こそその典型例と言えるじゃないか！
Main.TextENG: Even though she had convinced herself there was ``no such thing`` just a moment ago. ...But isn't the Reina Ryuugu case a perfect example of that?!

Main.TextJPN: 「だとしたら、やっぱりあの子は…！」
Main.TextENG: ``If that's the case, then that girl...!``

Main.TextJPN: ――ありえる…！
Main.TextENG: ...There was a possibility...!

Main.TextJPN: あの竜宮礼奈は絶対、この一連の事件につながるものを持っている…！！
Main.TextENG: That Reina Ryuugu had to have some connection to this series of incidents...!!

Main.TextJPN: ということは、彼女の身辺と背後関係をもっと徹底的に洗えば…きっと――！
Main.TextENG: In which case, if she investigated the girl's background a little more thoroughly... surely...!

Main.TextJPN: その時、目の前の電話が鳴る。思考を中断されて一瞬むっとなったが、すぐに切り替えて巴は受話器をとった。
Main.TextENG: Just then, the phone directly in front of her began to ring. Though she was confused for a moment by the sudden interruption, Tomoe quickly switched back to normal and picked up the receiver.

Main.TextJPN: 「はい、もしもし」
Main.TextENG: ``Yes, hello.``

Main.TextJPN: 『南井次長、山沖署長がお呼びです。@k@vS11/00/VT3B_soumuA2002.署長室へお越しください』
Main.TextENG: ``Assistant Director Minai, Chief Yamaoki is calling for you.@k@vS11/00/VT3B_soumuA2002. Please come to the chief's office.``

Main.TextJPN: 「…署長が？」
Main.TextENG: ``...The chief?``

Main.TextJPN: おそらくまどか不在の代理なのだろう、秘書代わりの総務課職員の電話を受け取って、巴は席を立ちあがった。
Main.TextENG: Having received a call from the general affairs office, likely needing her to act as Madoka's representative in her absence, Tomoe got up and rose to her feet.
